plot: Cornerman agrees to a friendly boxing match with his trainer. But when the fight turns ugly, an introspective reality check forces him to examine the direction his life is headed.
title: Cornerman
plot_es: Cornerman agrees to a friendly boxing match with his trainer. But when the fight turns ugly, an introspective reality check forces him to examine the direction his life is headed.
plot_en: Cornerman agrees to a friendly boxing match with his trainer. But when the fight turns ugly, an introspective reality check forces him to examine the direction his life is headed.
